en.header: Picky customers need to be rushed to cut the overthinking and make the right decision. True or false?
en.klf: Never rush a picky customer. Understand the reason behind their need for extra detail. Use your product knowledge to give them a clear picture and if you don’t know, offer to find out. Try and remain friendly.
en.tips: If you rush a picky client, they will most likely come back to change the product or service they've purchased after realising it doesn't quite fit their vision. So, better do it all at once!

fr.header: Les clients difficiles doivent être poussés à ménager leurs pensées afin de prendre la bonne décision. Vrai ou faux ?
fr.klf: Ne bousculez jamais un client difficile. Comprenez le raisonnement qui le pousse à demander plus de détails. Utilisez vos connaissances sur les produits pour lui donner une image claire et, si vous n'en possédez pas, proposez de vous renseigner afin d'aider le client. Essayez de rester amical.
fr.tips: Si vous précipitez un client difficile, il reviendra probablement pour échanger le produit ou le service acheté après s'être rendu compte qu'il ne correspondait pas tout à fait à sa vision. Alors, mieux vaut tout faire en même temps !

de.header: Picky customers need to be rushed to cut the overthinking and make the right decision. True or false?
de.klf: Never rush a picky customer. Understand the reason behind their need for extra detail. Use your product knowledge to give them a clear picture and if you don’t know, offer to find out. Try and remain friendly.
de.tips: If you rush a picky client, they will most likely come back to change the product or service they've purchased after realising it doesn't quite fit their vision. So, better do it all at once!
